sourcesContent: Name Country Representative Status {{customer.name}} {{customer.country.name}} {{customer.representative.name}} {{customer.status}} import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { InventarioService } from './inventario.service'; import { Inventario } from './inventario'; @Component({ selector: 'app-inventario', templateUrl: './inventario.component.html', styleUrls: ['./inventario.component.css'] }) export class InventarioComponent implements OnInit { inventario: Inventario[] = []; constructor(private inverntarioService : InventarioService){} ngOnInit(): void { this.getInventerio(); } getInventerio(){ this.inverntarioService.getInventerio().subscribe( response => { this.inventario.push(response); console.log(response); } ) } }
